cause.description:
Riley Children's Hospital is a wonderful place for children with health problems or who need surgeries to go! Let's show our support for all the Riley kids and their families! Lets show them that we care and that we are praying for each and everyone of them that they will continue to get healthier and stronger each and everyday!
1. WE LOVE RILEY!
2. WE SUPPORT ALL RILEY KIDS AND THEIR FAMILIES!
3. RILEY CHILDRENS HOSPITAL HELP SAVE MY LIFE!
cause.mission: show support for all the Riley kids and their families!
cause.name: Riley Children's Hospital
